start: Hi, if you want to play tic tac toe write /tttgame
main:
This is a tic-tac-toe field
To put a cross or a zero, just click on the button and its state will change
Good luck
irrelevant_field: Please play on the current field
draw:
Draw ⚔️
Lucky next time
Let's play one more timed, write /tttgame
occupied_cell:
This cell is already occupied
Select another cell
win_cross:
Congratulations to 🔥❌🔥 he is the winner 🎉
Player 2 don't be upset and ask for a rematch by writing /tttgame
win_zero:
Congratulations to 🔥⭕🔥 he is the winner 🎉
Player 1 don't be upset and ask for a rematch by writing /tttgame
unfinished_game:
Please finish playing the game or finish ahead of schedule by writing
/stopgame
unfinished_battle:
Please finish the battle or give up by writing
/leave
no_run_game:
No running game
Try to write /tttgame to play tic tac toe
no_run_battle:
No running battles
Try writing /battle @<opponent's nickname> to play tic-tac-toe
invalid_opponent:
The opponent's nickname was entered incorrectly
Check that the data is correct and try again
battle_cross_his_turn:
This is the tic-tac-toe field
To put a cross or zero, just click on the button and its state will change
You play for ❌
Your move
battle_cross_no_his_turn:
This is the tic-tac-toe field
To put a cross or zero, just click on the button and its state will change
You play for ❌
Wait for the opponent's move
battle_zero_his_turn:
This is the tic-tac-toe field
To put a cross or zero, just click on the button and its state will change
You play for ⭕
Your move
battle_zero_no_his_turn:
This is the tic-tac-toe field
To put a cross or zero, just click on the button and its state will change
You play for ⭕
Wait for the opponent's move
reversible_req: You can't start a battle with yourself
battle_req:
wants to play tic tac toe with you
Accept a game request?
player_dis_notify: This player has turned off invitation notifications, so you won't be able to play with them 😔
player_not_found: Hmm, strange, but I don't see a player with this nickname in my database, maybe he hasn't launched me on his device yet 🙁
